description.displayText: Steph was great. Me and my mother both were in a car accident in 2016. Steph was more then helpful anything we needed done she always was one step ahead .From taking us to appointments to helping us exercise or even simply being there to chat when the days were low she was always there. She definitely knows how to brighten a room. Would recommend!!!!!
description.originalText: Steph was great. Me and my mother both were in a car accident in 2016. description.displayText: Stephanie worked for us for about a year before my father past away.We honestly see her as a member of our family now . She is very social and welcoming. I wouldn't hesitate to hire her on the spot. My father wasn't always in a great mood but she seemed to change that really quickly she always knew how to get a laugh out of him. She's very quirky and silly but very professional when it comes to her job.  She always made sure he knew he wasn't alone.She would even come over to see him on her off days. We truly appreciate and are thankful that people like her exist .
